name: Coffee
description: one spoon of coffee with your spoons of sugar

name: Latte
description: one spoon of medium coffee, two spoons of your type of milk with your spoons of sugar

name: Espresso
description: one to two spoons of strong caffeinated dark coffee with your spoons of sugar

name: Cappuccino
description: equal spoons of coffee and milk with your spoons of sugar

name: Tea
description: one spoon of your type of tea with your spoons of sugar

name: Green Tea
description: one spoon of your type of green tea with your spoons of sugar

name: Frappuccino
description: one to two spoons of medium caffeinated cold coffee with your spoons of sugar. you can add milk

name: Herbs
description: one spoon of your type of herbs with your spoons of sugar

name: American Coffee
description: one to two spoons of medium caffeinated coffee with your spoons of sugar
